meanings.definition: Used as an intensifier to express anger or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Goddamned! I can't believe I lost my favorite toy.
meanings.sent2: She was so goddamned angry when her brother broke her vase.
meanings.sent3: Goddamned mosquitoes keep buzzing around my head!
meanings.sent4: The goddamned rain ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent5: I shouted 'goddamned' when I stubbed my toe on the table.

meanings.sent1: The goddamned pirate ship struck fear into the hearts of sailors.
meanings.sent2: He refused to enter the goddamned haunted house.
meanings.sent3: The goddamned cat knocked over the vase again!
meanings.sent4: The goddamned curse haunted the village for generations.
meanings.sent5: The goddamned tree stood alone in the dark forest, ominous and eerie.
